law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Council" means the Maryland Advisory Council on Deaf and Hard of Hearing Individuals.

section.section: "Deaf and hard of hearing individuals" means those residents of Maryland who have a partial or complete loss of hearing.
"Deaf and hard of hearing individuals" includes individuals who are deaf, hard of hearing, deafblind, and late-deafened.
"Deafblind" means those residents of Maryland who have concomitant vision and hearing loss.

text.section: "Director" means the Director of the Office.
"Office" means the Office of the Deaf and Hard of Hearing.
